original_title: 一把火 一张嘴  |  小老虎与上海交响乐团
overview: J Fever, China’s greatest “rap poet”, reinvents the origin myth of fire, in an exquisite performance with Shanghai Philharmonic in Shanghai Concert Hall, featuring composer Soulspeak and Yehaiyahan.
tagline: Humanity started with a fire and a mouth
title: One Fire One Mouth
